ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoore and Dark elf camp in Lesser Faydark
ygData.msgSnippet: I do believe that it s a shadowknight quest, but haven t tested it yet! ;-)  That s one of the two classes I ve never tried! On Mon, 17 Jul 2000 12:42:21
ygData.messageBody:
I do believe that it's a shadowknight quest, but haven't tested it
yet! ;-) That's one of the two classes I've never tried!


On Mon, 17 Jul 2000 12:42:21 -0400, "Scott Malin"
<Thanos0000@...> wrote:

>> Then we pulled Priestess Llandra, who is blue to us both. The two of us
>chased
>> her all over Lesser Faydark with chains/fear. The fight took at least 5
>> minutes. Man she has a lot of HP! I wasn't sure if she was a quest mob
>or
>> not; I looked today and she is. She dropped about 9 gold hehe. Clerics
>of
>> Tunare was one faction that improved.
>
>What quest is she involved with?
>
>Reedwind
>Bard of 17 tunes
>
>Underbrush
>Ranger of 42 broken trails
